snippet.title: Savior Developer Presentation - Future Games Show Spring Showcase
snippet.description:
Savior is an action-adventure platformer. Dramatically change a vast open world. Parkour effortlessly with pain-free intuitive platforming. Engage a variety of opponents with strategic, precision melee combat. Discover a rich world full of quests, colorful characters and countless secrets.

The Director of the upcoming game talks us through the game.

#Savior #SaviorGame
